definition: to calculate/to weigh (pros and cons)/to view as profitable/worthwhile/value for money/cost-effective
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
it isn't worth it/not cost-effective/not profitable/too expensive

sentences.english: Often, you’ll discover many items aren’t a deal at all.
sentences.chinese: 通常，你會發現很多商品交易一點都不划算。

sentences.english: It's not cost-efficient to save money in a bank for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 把錢存在銀行太長時間是很不划算的。

sentences.english: Rental cars in Dublin are highly affordable.
sentences.chinese: 在都柏林租車是非常划算的。

sentences.english: For description, reviews, and find a rival slow cooker 6 most cost-effective.
sentences.chinese: 獲取描述，評論和找到對手慢燉鍋6最划算。

sentences.english: but sometimes, if it's too expensive, I don't think it's justified to buy organic.
sentences.chinese: 不過有時候，如果太貴了，買有機食品就不划算了。

sentences.english: Theres no point, kill the power and run away, they are a stealthed unit.
sentences.chinese: 這很不划算，影隊是隱形單位，破壞電場跑開就是了。

sentences.english: They are not cost-effective if applied to all patients.
sentences.chinese: 如果應用到所有病人他們是不划算的。

sentences.english: I thought what a waste it would be to go back now.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲現在就回去未免太不划算了。

sentences.english: A small terra-cotta pot and saucer makes a cheap homemade version.
sentences.chinese: 國產的小赤土罐和茶托，更划算。

sentences.english: For a bank, deposits are the least expensive of all funding sources.
sentences.chinese: 對於銀行來說，存款是所有資金來源中最划算的。

sentences.english: Excellent! We have the finest cashmeres at affordable prices. How about we get you measured?
sentences.chinese: 好的，我們有價格划算的最好的羊絨。

sentences.english: Perhaps on a per-mile basis, the jet is more efficient.
sentences.chinese: 如果按單位旅程計算，飛機是要更划算一些。

sentences.english: Tom: That's really wonderful, exactly worthwhile than the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 太妙了，確實比展覽來的划算。

sentences.english: You get a suit for under a thousand dollars  which is a good fit , it's good.
sentences.chinese: 不到1000美元能買套西裝是很划算的。

sentences.english: It has been rather costly to install the machinery, but it should pay off in the longrun.
sentences.chinese: 安裝機械的代價很高，但從長遠看是划算的。

sentences.english: So how can you be sure to get the best deals in the most hassle free way possible? Read on for our 7 tips for getting in, getting your deals and getting out.
sentences.chinese: 因此如何確保你可以最省心地買到最划算的東西呢？

definition: worthwhile/to be a good deal/to be a bargain/to reckon up/to calculate
it isn't worth it/not cost-effective/not profitable/too expensive
cheap/inexpensive/small advantages/to let sb off lightly
